title: Under fire, UK PM apologises for staff joking about Christmas lockdown party
content:
1. Under fire, UK PM apologises for staff joking about Christmas lockdown party  Reuters UK
  2. Johnson apologises 'unreservedly' for No 10 staff video but says no party was held  Guardian News
  3. Downing Street party: No 10 staff joked about party amid lockdown restrictions  BBC News
  4. Christmas party loophole or not, Boris Johnson is on his way out  The Independent
  5. There appears to be no evidence whatsoever that Boris Johnson ‘shares your anger’  The Independent
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Under fire, UK PM apologises for staff joking about Christmas lockdown party  Reuters UK
Johnson apologises 'unreservedly' for No 10 staff video but says no party was held  Guardian News
Downing Street party: No 10 staff joked about party amid lockdown restrictions  BBC News
Christmas party loophole or not, Boris Johnson is on his way out  The Independent
There appears to be no evidence whatsoever that Boris Johnson ‘shares your anger’  The Independent
View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 炎上中の英国首相、クリスマスのロックダウン・パーティーを冗談で行ったスタッフを謝罪
遭受抨击，英国首相为员工开玩笑说要举办圣诞禁闭派对而道歉
遭受抨擊，英國首相爲員工開玩笑說要舉辦聖誕禁閉派對而道歉
